title: St. Clair Foods, Inc. Recalls Poultry Products Due To Misbranding And An Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 21, 2016 St. Clair Foods, Inc., a Memphis, Tenn. establishment, is recalling approximately 26,800 pounds of chicken and dumplings due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain milk...
